name: Deluxe Junior Suite
description: From the moment you enter, Deluxe Junior Suites offer a wonderful sensation of spaciousness within a unified volume with a clearly defined bedroom and a typically French-style living area. A king-size bed appears all the more majestic beneath an artisanally crafted canopy.
extras: King-size or twin beds (additional bed or cot available)
Video games and Apple TV upon request
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water

name: Executive Suite
description: The Executive Suites have stylish nobility as well as that extra little touch of soul that belongs to the French capital alone. Bathed in natural light, they all accommodate the art of entertaining with a separate living area that is independent from the bedroom.
extras: King-size or twin beds (additional bed or cot available)
Video games and Apple TV upon request
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water

name: Deluxe Suite
description: Vast with an aristocratic air, Deluxe Suites all have a separate entrance. A beautiful, spacious living space comprises a living room that flows elegantly to the dining room. In some rooms, rounded volumes enhance the charm of a historical experience.
extras: King-size or twin beds (additional bed or cot available)
Video games and Apple TV upon request
Complimentary seasonal fruit and mineral water
